message: Let's start with a fair deal. I'll take the lion's share, but I'm willing to share some of the wealth. What do you say?
Let's be fair.  I propose an even split - 50/50.  It's the only way we can both come out ahead in the long run.

I'm willing to compromise, but I still think my initial proposal was fair.  Let's meet in the middle this time.  If you reject this, I'm afraid I won't be able to offer you anything more in the next round.
Alice, we're both losing money with each round.  Let's be reasonable and split the difference from the last round. I'm willing to give up a bit more to reach a deal.
